mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from (select users.* from users order by userid) a ) a where rn between (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 and #{page}*#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into users (userid, userNm, alias, addr1, addr2, zipcode, pass, reg_dt, filename, realFilename) values (#{userId}, #{userNm}, #{alias}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcode}, #{pass}, sysdate, #{filename, jdbcType=NULL}, #{realfilename, jdbcType=NULL})
mapper.update: update users set userNm = #{userNm}, alias = #{alias}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, pass = #{pass}, reg_dt = sysdate, filename = nvl(#{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,filename), realfilename = nvl(#{realfilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,realfilename) where userId = #{userId}
